sentences.en: Any help you can give us will redound to your credit.
sentences.cn: 你所能给我们的任何帮助都会提高你的声誉.

sentences.en: Any help you can give us will redound to your own good name.
sentences.cn: 你所能给我们的任何帮助都会提高你自己的声誉.

sentences.en: Her efforts will redound to the general good.
sentences.cn: 他的努力将使他受益匪浅.

sentences.en: His achievement will redound the good name of the whole school.
sentences.cn: 他的成就将为整个学校增光.

sentences.en: His actions redound on his parents.
sentences.cn: 他的行动回报了他的父母.

sentences.en: His dishonesty will redound on him.
I believe the measure would redound to our mutual benefit and reputation.
sentences.cn: 我相信这项措施将有助于我们共同的利益和名誉.

sentences.en: My skill in such matters might redound to my advantage.
sentences.cn: 我在这种事情上的技能可能会对我有所帮助。

sentences.en: The sins of the fathers do not redound to the children.
The success in the Middle East redounds to his benefit.
sentences.cn: 中东地区的该项成就对他有益。

sentences.en: This will redound to his credit.
This work will redound to his credit.
sentences.cn: 这项工作将有助于提高他的声望.

sentences.en: Your academic achievements will redound to the fame of the research institution.
sentences.cn: 你的学术成就将有助于提高这个研究所的声誉.

sentences.en: Your achievement will redound to the good name of the whole school.
sentences.cn: 你的成就将为整个学校增光.

sentences.en: Your practical jokes will redound on you / your own head one day.
sentences.cn: 你那些恶作剧总有一天会使你自食其果.

words.tran_cn: 有助于；报偿，报应；被转移

trans.tran_en: If an action or situation redounds to your benefit or advantage, it gives people a good impression of you or brings you something that can improve your situation
